item.description: We'll be resuming sessions at this familiar haunt starting this coming Friday. Everyone who attends will be asked to bring work, and to bring fresh work -- not just poems they've had hanging around collecting dust, but recent writing, just-erupted from a hot lava tube. To use a rather unfortunate geological metaphor. Let us return to something of our original spirit of '01: poets coming together to crash their ideas against one another to see what works, and to understand why, and to be encouraged to do more of it.
item.how_to_find_us: They will find me at the large back table, or call 617-935-4951.
item.name: Boston Poetry Meetup
